column1: Smoque BBQ////Yumitty-yum-yum-yum!!!  This BYOB restaurant was a card in our "a-la-card" deck and was the first card we used.  They were out of their brisket the night we went
column2: but that wasn't my first choice anyhow so no biggee.  The staff was super-nice and made sure we were well aware they were out of brisket before we got in line.
